sect2.title: Installation of libmowgli
sect2.para: The libmowgli build system outputs text in color while running make. This is fine if you're running these commands in a terminal. However, if you're installing libmowgli with a script and piping the output to a log file it will add control characters to the file which may make the file unreadable.
